019package org.jgrapes.core.internal;
020
021import org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType;
022
023/**
024 * Helper class for simulating event handlers.
025 */
026public class ActionExecutor implements ComponentType {
027
028    /**
029     * Execute the event.
030     *
031     * @param <V> the value type
032     * @param event the event
033     * @throws Exception the exception
034     */
035    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
036    public <V> void execute(ActionEvent<V> event) throws Exception {
037        event.execute();
038    }
039
040}
